is_grayscale_enabled.description: Indicates whether the device display is currently using grayscale mode.

is_invert_colors_enabled.description: Indicates whether the system-wide color inversion setting is enabled.

is_increase_contrast_enabled.description: Indicates whether the system-wide increase contrast setting is enabled.

should_differentiate_without_color.description: Indicates whether the system should differentiate interface elements without relying solely on color.

is_button_shapes_enabled.description: Indicates whether the system-wide button shapes setting is enabled.

is_on_off_switch_labels_enabled.description: Indicates whether on/off switch labels are enabled in the system settings.

is_bold_text_enabled.description: Indicates whether the system-wide bold text accessibility setting is enabled.

has_reduce_transparency_enabled.description: Indicates whether the system-wide reduce transparency setting is enabled.

has_reduce_motion_enabled.description: Indicates whether the system-wide reduce motion setting is enabled.

has_reduced_animations_enabled.description: Indicates whether the user prefers reduced animations or cross-fade transitions.

is_screen_reader_enabled.description: Indicates whether a screen reader is currently active.

is_speak_screen_enabled.description: Indicates whether the Speak Screen feature is enabled.

is_speak_selection_enabled.description: Indicates whether the text-to-speech selection feature is enabled.

is_assistive_switch_enabled.description: Indicates whether an alternative input method like Switch Control or Switch Access is currently enabled.

is_assistive_touch_enabled.description: Indicates whether the system-wide AssistiveTouch feature is currently enabled.

is_shake_to_undo_enabled.description: Indicates whether the Shake to Undo feature is enabled.

is_closed_captioning_enabled.description: Indicates whether closed captioning is enabled for media playback.

is_mono_audio_enabled.description: Indicates whether the system-wide mono audio setting is enabled.

is_video_autoplay_enabled.description: Indicates whether the video autoplay setting is enabled in the system or application.

is_single_app_mode_enabled.description: Indicates whether the device is currently locked to a single app through Guided Access or Screen Pinning.
